text:
YOUR TONGUE IS GOING
TO DRY OUT.

LISTEN, MAN.
WHY DON'T YOU
JUST ASK HER OUT?

I CAN'T ASK OUT
 KARI LANGSDORF.

SHE'S GOT NO IDEA
WHO I AM.

SHE'S NEVER EVEN TALKED
 TO ME.

SORRY, MAN.
I DIDN'T SEE YOU THERE.

CHECK OUT A MOVIE
THIS WEEKEND?

NO, BUT I'M QUARTERBACK
OF THE FOOTBALL TEAM,

SO, JUSTIN.
DO YOU PLAY
BASEBALL?

YOU GOING TO TRY OUT
FOR THE TEAM THIS YEAR?

YOU THINK YOU GOT A SHOT
AT MAKING IT?

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THAT THE END WILL NO DOUBT
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO YOUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE WHAT YOU
WANT BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY--ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

HEY, ALEX. CAN I GET
A TURKEY SANDWICH?

I'M OFF THE CLOCK.
YOU KNOW WHERE
EVERYTHING IS.

WELL, IF YOU'RE
OFF THE CLOCK,

THEN WHAT
ARE WE DOING HERE?

I'VE GOT
A JEAN JACKET AT HOME

THAT'S NOT GOING
TO SEQUIN ITSELF.

FOR MY DAD TO COME BACK
WITH THE TEAM HE'S COACHING

SO WE CAN SEE
THE CUTE GUYS.

ROOT BEER FLOATS
ARE ON THE HOUSE!

JUSTIN TRIED OUT
FOR THE FIRST TIME,

AND HE EVEN MADE THE TEAM.
WHO KNEW?

WELL,
I KNOW HOW MUCH
YOU LOVE BASEBALL,

SO I FIGURED
I'D GIVE IT A SHOT.

I'M THE AZTEC'S
NUMBER ONE FAN.

UH, MAXY,
WE REALLY APPRECIATE
THE ENTHUSIASM,

BUT LET'S NOT REVISIT
WHAT HAPPENED
ON THE SOCCER FIELD.

THE ONE
THE PARK POLICE SAID
YOU CAN'T GO TO ANYMORE.

EXCUSE ME
FOR CHEERING
FOR MY BROTHER.

ACCORDING TO
THE PARK POLICE, YES.

THE KID IN THE DIAPER
STARTED IT.

HEY, ALEX, DO YOU HAVE
AN EXTRA-LONG SPOON?

WHAT WAS THAT?
I THOUGHT YOU WERE
OFF THE CLOCK.

I'M ALWAYS ON THE CLOCK
FOR RILEY.

I CAN'T BELIEVE JUSTIN'S
ON RILEY'S TEAM.

AFTER YEARS OF JUSTIN
BEING A BORE,

I CAN USE HIM
FOR MY OWN PERSONAL GAIN.

HOW ARE YOU GOING
TO DO THAT?

I HAVE NO IDEA.
BUT IT'S A NICE FEELING.

THE KIND
THAT MAKES YOU STOP

AND GIVE THANKS
YOU HAVE A BROTHER.

HERE HE COMES.
HOW DO I LOOK?

JUST FINE?
FINE ISN'T GOOD ENOUGH!

HEY, JUSTIN.
CONGRATS ON MAKING
THE TEAM RILEY'S ON.

YEP. I MADE THE TEAM
ALL RIGHT.

WELL,
YOU DON'T SOUND ALL RIGHT.
WHAT'S THE MATTER?

I'VE DONE
A BAD, BAD THING, ALEX.

I CHARMED THE BASEBALL
SO DAD WOULD THING
I WAS A GOOD PITCHER.

I DIDN'T KNOW
YOU WERE INTO BASEBALL.

I'M NOT.
I'M INTO KARI LANGSDORF.

OK. SO WHAT'S
THE BAD, BAD THING
YOU DID?

I CHEATED.
I USED MAGIC TO MAKE
THE BASEBALL TEAM.

IF DAD KNEW,
HE WOULD FLIP OUT.

MMM. YEAH, BUT
THE IMPORTANT THING IS

IS NOW YOU'RE ON
THE BASEBALL TEAM

SO HE CAN TEACH YOU
SOME STUFF.

BUT UNTIL THEN,
YOU SHOULD PROBABLY
USE MAGIC

ALEX, I'M NOT LIKE YOU.
I DON'T BREAK THE RULES.

I'M RIDDEN WITH GUILT.
IT'S EATING UP
MY INSIDES.

PRETTY SOON,
I'LL BE JUST A SHELL.

AND JUSTIN,
MAGIC IS YOUR TALENT.

I MEAN, DO THEY MAKE
A TALL BASKETBALL PLAYER
PLAY ON HIS KNEES?

DO THEY MAKE A FAST SWIMMER
ONLY DO THE DOG PADDLE?

THEN WHY SHOULD A WIZARD
NOT USE MAGIC?

JUST SO HAPPY
TO MEET YOU.

YES, HE IS.
AND HIS NAME IS JUSTIN.

WELL, IT'S NICE
TO MEET YOU, JUSTIN.

I LOVE GOING TO
THE BASEBALL GAMES,

SO I'M SURE
WE'LL BE SEEING
A LOT OF EACH OTHER

BECAUSE YOU PLAY
 IN THE BASEBALL GAMES.

SHE CAN TOTALLY SEE ME.
I'M NOT INVISIBLE
ANYMORE.

NO WAY. YOU KNOW
THE INVISIBILITY SPELL?

I'LL TRADE YOU FOR
 THE POPULARITY SPELL.

YOU KNOW WHAT?
I AM TOTALLY GOING
TO USE MAGIC.

YOU ALWAYS KNOW
THE RIGHT WRONG THING
TO DO.

NO, GO SIT BY RILEY
AND TELL HIM
HOW COOL I AM.

HERE WE GO.
COME ON, NOW.

HE AND I ARE GOING
TO BE GOING OUT SOON.

LET'S SEE
IF YOU CAN FINISH
THIS THING.

JUSTIN LOOKS GREAT
IN HIS UNIFORM.

HE SLEPT IN IT
LAST NIGHT.

DO YOU WANT TO TALK
TO HIM ALONE?

IF YOU NEED ME,
I'LL BE OVER HERE.

IT WAS MY IDEA TO GO WITH
THE SLEEVELESS JERSEYS.

I'M GOING TO BE
YOUR GOOD LUCK CHARM.

IF THIS GUY STRIKES OUT
AND WE WIN,

GET THIS GUY OUT
AND WE WIN.

MOW THIS GUY DOWN.
HE AIN'T NO HITTER!

HE COULDN'T HIT IT
IF YOU THREW
A BASKETBALL!

HEY, KID.
DO YOU MIND?
THAT'S MY SON.

THAT'S MY BROTHER.
I'M HIS BROTHER.

TOGETHER, WE'LL SEND
YOU LOSERS HOME.

NICE WORK, SON.
BRINGING THE HEAT!

YOU SHOULD CHANGE
YOUR FIRST NAME TO "LOU"

YOU EVER SEEN
A KID PITCH
LIKE THAT, HUH?

COME TO THINK OF IT,
I'VE NEVER SEEN A KID
PITCH LIKE THAT, EITHER.

YOU WERE AWESOME
OUT THERE TODAY, JUSTIN.

THOSE GUYS HAD NO CLUE
WHAT YOU WERE THROWING
AT THEM.

IT'S LIKE
THEY HAD NEVER SEEN
PITCHES BEFORE.

THAT'S WHAT I DO--
THROW 'EM
THE DARK STUFF,

TURN UP THE HEAT,
GIVE THEM A LITTLE
POP GOES THE WEASEL.

IS THAT, LIKE,
A BASEBALL TERM?

OH, I'M GLAD
WE FINALLY MET.
[CHUCKLES]

JUSTIN. I NEED
TO TALK TO YOU.

AS MY DAD
OR AS MY COACH?

YOU BROKE THE RULES.
YOU NEVER BREAK THE RULES.

DO THEY MAKE
A TALL BASKETBALL PLAYER
DO THE DOG PADDLE?

DO THEY MAKE
A FAST SWIMMER SWIM
ON HIS KNEES?

ALEX TOLD ME
TO USE MAGIC.

HERE'S SOME ADVICE.
STOP LISTENING
TO YOUR SISTER.

YOU'VE ALWAYS BEEN
A STICKLER FOR THE RULES.

ALL RIGHT. FINE.
I'LL QUIT THE TEAM.

NO. YOU'RE NOT QUITTING
THE TEAM.

YOU'RE GOING
TO LEARN YOUR LESSON
BY PITCHING WITHOUT MAGIC.

EXACTLY.
THAT'S THE "LEARNING
YOUR LESSON" PART.

I'M READY
FOR JUSTIN'S
SECOND GAME.

THAT FOAM FINGER'S
A LITTLE BIG?

NO. BUT THIS ONE
MIGHT BE.

HEY, IF IT RAINS,
YOU CAN MOP UP
THE INFIELD FOR US.

HEY, ALEX.
YOU READY TO GO
TO THE GAME? COME ON.

BUT YOU'RE RILEY'S
GOOD LUCK CHARM!

WELL, MY DAD'S MAKING
JUSTIN PITCH,

EVEN THOUGH
HE CAN'T USE A SPELL.

YEAH. JUSTIN HAD
A SPELLING TEST

SO, HE'S GOING
TO GET CLOBBERED,

AND THE TEAM'S GOING
TO LOSE.

BUT DON'T YOU WANT
TO SEE RILEY?

YES, BUT NOT IF
THEY'RE GOING TO LOSE.

THAT'S JUST GOING TO
SHOW RILEY THAT I'M NOT
HIS GOOD LUCK CHARM.

BUT HE MIGHT WISH
YOU WERE THERE.

I KNOW.
THAT'S THE GOOD PART.

I WON'T BE THERE,
WHICH WILL REINFORCE
THE IDEA

THAT I AM
HIS GOOD LUCK CHARM.

BUT I THINK
IT WOULD BE FUN
TO SEE RILEY.

LET ME EXPLAIN THIS
TO YOU SLOWLY.

I KNOW. I KNOW.
I'M GETTING CREAMED
OUT HERE.

HEY, DOES YOUR SISTER
EVER ASK ABOUT ME?

I KNOW IT WAS
TOUGH GOING TODAY, JUSTIN?

THEIR GUYS KEPT RUNNING
AROUND AND AROUND
AND AROUND

ONLY ONE OF MY KIDS
IS GOING TO BE ABLE
TO KEEP HIS POWERS.

I DON'T WANT YOU RELYING
ON MAGIC

BECAUSE YOU MIGHT NOT
HAVE IT ONE DAY.

ALL RIGHT, ALL RIGHT.
I GET IT.

THEN WHY DID YOU
TRY OUT FOR THE TEAM?

YOU KNOW,
WHEN I WAS YOUR AGE,

I TRIED USING MAGIC
TO IMPRESS A GIRL.

DON'T EVEN SAY
I SAID THAT,
EVEN AS A JOKE.

AND CHEATING
TO IMPRESS PEOPLE
ULTIMATELY FAILS.

SO, I SUGGEST
YOU PRACTICE HARD,

BECAUSE I'VE DECIDED
TO PITCH YOU AGAIN
NEXT GAME.

DAD, WITHOUT MAGIC,
I'LL GET CREAMED
AGAIN.

YOU HAVE SOME
OF MY NATURAL ABILITY.

WE JUST HAVE
TO FIND IT.

NO. LOOK, SON,
YOU MADE A COMMITMENT,

AND YOU HAVE
TO STICK TO IT.

YOU THINK
I CAN DO BETTER
THAN I DID TODAY?

IT WOULD BE HARD
TO DO WORSE.

ALL RIGHT, FINE.
I'LL GIVE IT A SHOT.

SO IF I'D GONE
TO THE GAME,

I COULDN'T POSSIBLY BE
RILEY'S GOOD LUCK CHARM.

AND THEN,
HE WOULDN'T BE
INTERESTED IN ME.

OHH, I GET IT!
GOOD PLAN.

NOW, LET'S TALK
ABOUT SOMETHING
THAT'S REALLY IMPORTANT:
HOW CUTE IS HE IN THAT?

SHE WASN'T THERE,
AND YOU LOST.

SOUNDS LIKE SHE'S
YOUR GOOD LUCK CHARM.

I'M SORRY, RILEY.
I DIDN'T KNOW YOU WANTED ME
TO COME TO EVERY GAME.

YEAH. YOU'RE
OUR GOOD LUCK CHARM,

AND WE NEED GOOD LUCK
EVERY GAME.

I'LL TELL YOU WHAT.
IF YOU COME
TO OUR NEXT GAME,

I'LL TAKE YOU
TO THE FALL DANCE.

AND WHAT MAKES YOU THINK
I'D WANT TO GO

TO THE FALL DANCE
WITH YOU?

YEAH, YOU'RE RIGHT.
OK. YOU GOT A DEAL.

BUT WITH YOU,
I GOT A FEELING

WE'LL GO ALL THE WAY TO
THE STATE CHAMPIONSHIP.

AND ALL THE WAY
TO THE FALL DANCE.

OH. WAIT.
WHAT ARE YOU GOING
TO DO

IF JUSTIN PITCHES
BADLY NEXT GAME?

YOU'RE NOT
HIS GOOD LUCK CHARM.

AS LONG AS
I HAVE SOMETHING
TO DO WITH IT,

I'M PRETTY SURE
JUSTIN'S TEAM WILL WIN
THE NEXT GAME.

I DIDN'T PAINT MY FACE
FOR A TIED-UP GAME!

THIS STUFF
IS STARTING TO BURN.
IS THAT BAD?

I SURE HOPE JUSTIN
GETS OUT OF THIS JAM.

OTHERWISE,
YOU'RE NOT RILEY'S
GOOD LUCK CHARM,

AND I WAS UP
HALF THE NIGHT
WITH MY MOM

AND WHEN YOU'RE NOT,
HE DOESN'T.

I KNOW JUSTIN
WILL GET OUT OF THIS.

IS THERE SOMETHING
YOU WANT TO TELL ME?

NO. IS THERE SOMETHING
YOU WANT TO TELL ME?

YOU'RE CALLING TIME OUT
TO TALK TO A GUY
SITTING ON THE BENCH?

I TOLD YOU,
I DIDN'T DO IT.

YEAH, I KNOW, I KNOW.
I WAS WATCHING YOU.

SO I WANT YOU
TO USE YOUR POWERS
TO COUNTERACT IT.

UH, TIME OUT, UMP.
TIME OUT.

YOU'RE CALLING TIME OUT
TO TALK TO A FAN?

SHOW ME THE RULE, UMP.
SHOW ME THE RULE.

I KNOW
WHAT YOU'RE DOING,
YOUNG LADY,
AND I WANT IT TO STOP.

I WAS JUST TRYING
TO HELP.

SO THEY WON'T REMEMBER
WHAT HAPPENED
THE PAST FEW MINUTES.

I DON'T KNOW.
I DON'T REMEMBER.

GO HOME AND CRY,
YOU LITTLE BABIES!

THERE HE IS.
GET HIM. GET HIM!

I DON'T REMEMBER
HOW THE GAME ENDED.

I THINK ALEX HAD SOMETHING
TO DO WITH IT.

THIS COULD COME
IN HANDY SOMEDAY.

SO, ALEX, LOOKS LIKE
I'VE GOT A DATE
FOR THE FALL DANCE.

YES, YOU DO.
AND FRIDAY NIGHT, TOO.

YEAH. YOU ASKED ME
RIGHT AFTER YOU SCORED
THE WINNING RUN.

GREAT.
LOOKING FORWARD
TO FRIDAY NIGHT.

I KNOW
WHAT YOU DID, ALEX.

YOU BROKE THE RULES
AND USED MAGIC

BECAUSE YOU WANTED RILEY
TO ASK YOU OUT.

YOU'RE NOT GOING
TO THE FALL DANCE.

WHAT?
JUSTIN USED MAGIC.
WHERE'S HIS PUNISHMENT?

JUSTIN WAS ALREADY PUNISHED
ON THE BASEBALL FIELD

WHEN THE OTHER TEAM
RAN AROUND AND THEN AROUND

SINCE YOU LIKE
BASEBALL PLAYERS
AND EVERYTHING,

IF MAYBE YOU'D NOT WANT
TO NOT GO TO A MOVIE
OR SOMETHING.
DID YOU JUST ASK ME OUT?

I THINK SO.
I WAS TRYING TO.

OK, SURE!
I'D LOVE TO GO
TO A MOVIE WITH YOU!

EXCELLENT!
SO, WE'RE ON
THIS WEEKEND?

WHAT MOVIE
DO YOU WANT TO SEE?

OH, I ONLY DATE
BASEBALL PLAYERS,

AND I ONLY SEE
MOVIES ABOUT--

ARE THERE ANY MOVIES
OUT RIGHT NOW
ABOUT CATS?

UH, WOULD YOU SEE
A MOVIE ABOUT DOGS?

NOT UNLESS THEY'RE CATS
DISGUISED AS DOGS.

ARE THE CATS,
LIKE, DISGUISED
AS FARM ANIMALS--

WHY DON'T WE WAIT
TILL A CAT MOVIE COMES OUT?

I'LL KEEP AN EYE
ON THE PAPER
REAL CLOSE.

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY--ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

CAPTIONING PERFORMED BY
THE NATIONAL CAPTIONING
INSTITUTE, INC.
